verses.verse: And they told <WH5046> David <WH1732>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH6430>, the Philistines are fighting <WH3898> against Keilah <WH7084>, and are robbing <WH8154> the threshing-floors <WH1637>.

Therefore David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Shall I go <WH3212> and smite <WH5221> these Philistines <WH6430>? And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto David <WH1732>, Go <WH3212>, and smite <WH5221> the Philistines <WH6430>, and save <WH3467> Keilah <WH7084>.

And David <WH1732>'s men <WH582> said <WH559> unto him <WH3373>, Behold, we are afraid here in Judah <WH3063>: how much more then if we go <WH3212> to Keilah <WH7084> against the armies <WH4634> of the Philistines <WH6430>?

Then David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of Jehovah <WH3068> yet again <WH3254>. And Jehovah <WH3068> answered <WH6030> him <WH6030>, and said, Arise <WH6965>, go down <WH3381> to Keilah <WH7084>; for I will deliver <WH5414> the Philistines <WH6430> into thy hand <WH3027>.

And David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> to Keilah <WH7084>, and fought <WH3898> with the Philistines <WH6430>, and brought away <WH5090> their cattle <WH4735>, and slew <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>. So David <WH1732> save <WH3467> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Keilah <WH7084>.

And it came to pass <WH54>, when Abiathar the son <WH1121> of Ahimelech <WH288> fled <WH1272> to David <WH1732> to Keilah <WH7084>, that he came down <WH3381> with an ephod <WH646> in his hand <WH3027>.

And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was come <WH935> to Keilah <WH7084>. And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559>, God <WH430> hath delivered <WH5234> him into my hand <WH3027>; for he is shut in <WH5462>, by entering <WH935> into a town <WH5892> that hath gates <WH1817> and bars <WH1280>.
And Saul <WH7586> summoned <WH8085> all the people <WH5971> to <WH8085> war <WH4421>, to go down <WH3381> to Keilah <WH7084>, to besiege <WH6696> David <WH1732> and his men <WH582>.

And David <WH1732> knew <WH3045> that Saul <WH7586> was devising <WH2790> mischief <WH7451> against him <WH559>; and he said to Abiathar <WH54> the priest <WH3548>, Bring hither <WH5066> the ephod <WH646>.

Then said <WH559> David <WH1732>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, thy servant <WH5650> hath surely <WH8085> heard <WH8085> that Saul <WH7586> seeketh <WH1245> to come <WH935> to Keilah <WH7084>, to destroy <WH7843> the city for my sake <WH5892>.

Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver me up <WH5462> into his hand <WH3027>? will Saul <WH7586> come down <WH3381>, as thy servant <WH5650> hath heard <WH8085>? O Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, I beseech thee <WH5046>, tell thy servant <WH5650>. And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, He will come down <WH3381>.

Then said <WH559> David <WH1732>, Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver <WH5462> up to me and my men <WH582> into the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586>? And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, They will deliver thee up <WH5462>.

Then David <WH1732> and his men <WH582>, who were about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>, arose <WH6965> and departed <WH3318> out of Keilah <WH7084>, and went <WH1980> whithersoever <WH834> they could go <WH1980>. And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was escaped <WH4422> from Keilah <WH7084>; and he forbare <WH2308> to go forth <WH3318>.

And David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> in the strongholds <WH4679>, and remained <WH3427> in the hill-country <WH2022> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128>. And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> him every day <WH3117>, but God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> him not into his hand <WH3027>.
And David <WH1732> saw <WH7200> that Saul <WH7586> was come out <WH3318> to seek <WH1245> his life <WH5315>: and David <WH1732> was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128> in the wood <WH2793>.
And Jonathan <WH3083>, Saul <WH7586>'s son <WH1121>, arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> to David <WH1732> into the wood <WH2793>, and strengthened <WH2388> his hand <WH3027> in God <WH430>.

And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3372>, Fear not <WH3027>; for the hand of Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> shall not find <WH4672> thee <WH4427>; and thou shalt be king over Israel <WH3478>, and I shall be next <WH4932> unto thee <WH7586>; and that also Saul my father <WH1> knoweth <WH3045>.

And they two <WH8147> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>: and David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> in the wood <WH2793>, and Jonathan <WH3083> went <WH1980> to his house <WH1004>.

Then came up <WH5927> the Ziphites <WH2130> to Saul <WH7586> to Gibeah <WH1390>, saying <WH559>, Doth not David <WH1732> hide <WH5641> himself with us in the strongholds <WH4679> in the wood <WH2793>, in the hill <WH1389> of Hachilah <WH2444>, which is on the south <WH3225> of the desert <WH3452>?

Now therefore <WH4428>, O king, come down <WH3381>, according to all the desire <WH185> of thy soul <WH5315> to come down <WH3381>; and our part shall be to deliver <WH5462> him up into the king <WH4428>'s hand <WH3027>.
And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be ye of Jehovah <WH3068>; for ye have had compassion on me <WH2550>.

Go <WH3212>, I pray you <WH3559>, make yet more sure <WH3045>, and know and see <WH7200> his place <WH4725> where his haunt <WH7272> is <WH7200>, and who hath seen him there <WH559>; for it is told me that he dealeth very <WH6191> subtly <WH6191>.

See <WH7200> therefore <WH3045>, and take knowledge of all the lurking-places <WH4224> where he hideth <WH2244> himself <WH7725>, and come ye again to me of a certainty <WH3559>, and I will go <WH1980> with you <WH3426>: and it shall come to pass, if he be in the land <WH776>, that I will search <WH2664> him out among all the thousands <WH505> of Judah <WH3063>.

And they arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> to Ziph <WH2128> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>: but David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> were in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>, in the Arabah <WH6160> on the south <WH3225> of the desert <WH3452>.

And Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> to seek <WH1245> him <WH5046>. And they told David <WH1732>: wherefore he came down <WH3381> to the rock <WH5553>, and abode <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>. And when Saul <WH7586> heard <WH8085> that <WH7291>, he pursued after <WH310> David <WH1732> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>.

And Saul <WH7586> went <WH3212> on this side <WH6654> of the mountain <WH2022>, and David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> on that side <WH6654> of the mountain <WH2022>: and David <WH1732> made haste <WH2648> to get away <WH3212> for fear <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586>; for Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH582> compassed <WH5849> David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> round about <WH5849> to take them <WH8610>.
But there came <WH935> a messenger <WH4397> unto Saul <WH7586>, saying <WH559>, Haste <WH4116> thee <WH3212>, and come; for the Philistines <WH6430> have made a raid <WH6584> upon the land <WH776>.

So Saul <WH7586> returned <WH7725> from pursuing <WH7291> after <WH310> David <WH1732>, and went <WH3212> against <WH7125> the Philistines <WH6430>: therefore they called <WH7121> that place <WH4725> Sela-hammahlekoth <WH5555>.
And David <WH1732> went up <WH5927> from thence <WH3427>, and dwelt in the strongholds <WH4679> of En-gedi <WH5872>.
